attribute.name: attPrestige
attribute.desc_key: Spend some of that redundant skill points on some neat extra effects!

perk.name: perkAcrobatics
perk.desc_key: You're pretty agile and learned how to avoid injuries from falling uncontrolled.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your safe fall distance by 1m.
Increase your safe fall distance by 2m.
Increase your safe fall distance by 3m.
Increase your safe fall distance by 4m.
Increase your safe fall distance by 5m.

perk.name: perkHeatSyn
perk.desc_key: You've lived in the desert for a long time thus heat has less effects on you.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your resistance agains heat by 5
Increase your resistance agains heat by 9
Increase your resistance agains heat by 12
Increase your resistance agains heat by 14
Increase your resistance agains heat by 15

perk.name: perkColdSyn
perk.desc_key: You've lived in the frosty mountains for a long time thus cold has less effects on you.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your resistance agains cold by 5
Increase your resistance agains cold by 9
Increase your resistance agains cold by 12
Increase your resistance agains cold by 14
Increase your resistance agains cold by 15

perk.name: perkMaxHP
perk.desc_key: Increase your hardiness and thus your maximum health.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your maximum health by 12
Increase your maximum health by 24
Increase your maximum health by 36
Increase your maximum health by 48
Increase your maximum health by 60
Increase your maximum health by 68
Increase your maximum health by 76
Increase your maximum health by 84
Increase your maximum health by 92
Increase your maximum health by 100

perk.desc_key: Increase your endurance and thus your maximum stamina.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your maximum Stamina by 12

Increase your maximum Stamina by 60
Increase your maximum Stamina by 68
Increase your maximum Stamina by 76
Increase your maximum Stamina by 84
Increase your maximum Stamina by 92
Increase your maximum Stamina by 100

perk.name: perkDmgRes
perk.desc_key: Increase your hardiness and thus your resistance to damage.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your Damage Resistance by 2.4%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 4.8%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 7.2%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 9.6%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 12%
Increase yourDamage Resistance by 13.6%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 15.2%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 16.8%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 18.4%
Increase your Damage Resistance by 20%

perk.name: perkStaLoss
perk.desc_key: Swinging stuff around the whole time accustomed you to them so now it's less exerting. Lose less Stamina per melee swing.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Lose 3% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 6% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 9% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 12% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 15% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 17% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 19% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 21% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 23% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons
Lose 25% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons

perk.name: perkStaRegen
perk.desc_key: All this cardio workout increased your endurance vastly. Regenerate more stamina at all times.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Regenerate 3% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 6% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 9% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 12% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 15% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 17% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 19% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 21% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 23% more stamina at all times
Regenerate 25% more stamina at all times

perk.name: perkRecuperate
perk.desc_key: You've got a very healthy body and can regenerate even faster than other people. (For comparison: level 5 of healing factor gives you the same amount as lvl 10 of this. So you will regenerate 1 health every 2 seconds with both perks fully skilled.)

effect_description.long_desc_key: Regenerate an additional 0.03 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.06 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.09 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.12 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.15 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.17 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.19 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.21 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.23 health per second at all times
Regenerate an additional 0.25 health per second at all times

perk.name: perkSuperiorMetabolism
perk.desc_key: Your organism takes it easy. Lose even less food and water from physical exertion.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Lose 3% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 6% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 9% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 12% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 15% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 17% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 19% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 21% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 23% less food and water from physical exertion.
Lose 25% less food and water from physical exertion.

perk.name: perkMobility
perk.desc_key: Running hundreds and thousands of miles earned you some well conditioned legs. You're now able too move faster independent of the circumstances.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your mobility by 4%
Increase your mobility by 8%
Increase your mobility by 12%
Increase your mobility by 16%
Increase your mobility by 20%
Increase your mobility by 22%
Increase your mobility by 24%
Increase your mobility by 26%
Increase your mobility by 28%
Increase your mobility by 30%

perk.name: perkMiningMastery
perk.desc_key: You've acquired the knowledge how to gather more resources while mining.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 12%
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 24%
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 36%
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 48%

effect_description.desc_base: + 60% more stone, ore and lumber, +10% Block Damage
effect_description.long_desc_key: Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 60%. Increase any block damage you cause by 10%.
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 68%
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 76%
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 84%
Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 92%

effect_description.desc_base: + 100% more stone, ore and lumber, + 20% Block Damage
effect_description.long_desc_key: Gather rate of stone, ores and lumber increased by 100%. Increase any block damage you cause by 20%.

perk.name: perkHealingArts
perk.desc_key: You've learned how to properly treat wounds and increase the effectivity of your attempts. (additive bonus)

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase the healing efficiency of medical items by 25%.
Increase the healing efficiency of medical items by 45%.
Increase the healing efficiency of medical items by 60%.
Increase the healing efficiency of medical items by 70%.
Increase the healing efficiency of medical items by 75%.

perk.name: perkArmorSpecialist
perk.desc_key: Your armor feels like a second skin an thus is even more durable now. (In addition to the corresponding armor perk, the last rank will nullify all damage to armor).

effect_description.long_desc_key: Decrease the wearout of your armor by an additional 12%
Decrease the wearout of your armor by an additional 20%
Decrease the wearout of your armor by an additional 26%
Decrease the wearout of your armor by an additional 31%
Decrease the wearout of your armor by an additional 34%

perk.name: perkWeaponSpecialist
perk.desc_key: You know how to properly maintain your weapons, which is why they degrade at a slower rate.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Decrease the wearout of your weapons by 20%
Decrease the wearout of your weapons by 31%
Decrease the wearout of your weapons by 39%
Decrease the wearout of your weapons by 45%
Decrease the wearout of your weapons by 50%

perk.name: perkXPBonus
perk.desc_key: Increase your smarts and thus learn faster.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your earned experience by 12%
Increase your earned experience by 24%
Increase your earned experience by 36%
Increase your earned experience by 48%
Increase your earned experience by 60%
Increase yourearned experience by 68%
Increase your earned experience by 76%
Increase your earned experience by 84%
Increase your earned experience by 92%
Increase your earned experience by 100%

perk.name: perkCraftSpeed
perk.desc_key: Your nimble fingers allow you to craft even faster than before.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your crafting speed by 8%
Increase your crafting speed by 16%
Increase your crafting speed by 24%
Increase your crafting speed by 32%
Increase your crafting speed by 40%
Increase your crafting speed by 46%
Increase your crafting speed by 52%
Increase your crafting speed by 58%
Increase your crafting speed by 64%
Increase your crafting speed by 70% and add an additional crafting tier.

perk.name: perkRascal
perk.desc_key: You know how to properly bargain. Only true rascals may get the best deals.

effect_description.long_desc_key: You're able to get 2% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 4% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 6% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 8% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 10% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 11% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 12% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 13% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 14% better prices while selling and buying at traders.
You're able to get 15% better prices while selling and buying at traders.

perk.name: perkFoodEngineering
perk.desc_key: You know how to properly work with food, how to use it efficiently and get the most out of your resources

effect_description.long_desc_key: You're able to cook more efficiently, using 6% less resources.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 12% less resources.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 18% less resources.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 24% less resources.

effect_description.desc_base: Cooking costs 30% less resources, gather one additional crop
effect_description.long_desc_key: You're able to cook more efficiently, using 30% less resources. Also your crops get more fertile, increasing your harvest by 1.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 34% less resourcess.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 38% less resourcess.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 42% less resourcess.
You're able to cook more efficiently, using 46% less resourcess.

effect_description.desc_base: Cooking costs 50% less resources, gather two additional crops
effect_description.long_desc_key: You're able to cook more efficiently, using 50% less resources. Also your crops get more fertile, increasing your harvest by 2.

perk.name: perkRevered
perk.desc_key: You've made yourself quite the name and people are now even more grateful for your help in these times.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 40%
Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 80%
Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 120%

Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 240%
Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 260%
Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 280%
Increase the amount of Quest Rewards by 300%. Also you may choose an additional reward for quests.

perk.name: perkAPM
perk.desc_key: All those blows you've dealt evolved into a daily routine. Now you're able too attack even faster.

Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 16%
